sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Hi,

A new Project Name: ${project_name} has been Created by: ${sys_created_by} and you are identified as the project owner.

Here are the details of the project:

Project Id: ${number}

Project Name: ${project_name}

Project Status: ${project_status}

Project Type: ${project_type}

Resource Allocated: ${resource_allocated}

Resource List: ${resource_list}

Resource Required: ${resource_required}

Should you have any queries regarding this project, please feel free to reach out to ${sys_created_by}.

Thank you,
sysevent_email_template.name: project.created.template
sysevent_email_template.subject: ${number} - A new project has been created.
